titleStmt.title: Words for an entertainment at the music-feast on St. Ceceila's Day being the 22d of November, 1695 / set to music by Dr. John Blow ; written by Mr. Motteux ; perform'd by two choirs.
titleStmt.author: Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.
